content: Are SVGs allowed as image types? Or should I get a PNG or JPEG?
svgs are problematic. Not supported in all browsers, though in all current browsers.
where do you want to use a svg?
Notes for an ActivityDefinition and PlanDefinition, diagram of the relationship.
We use them in other parts of the spec, so presumably adding more isn't an issue?
Looking at the images folder, most things appear to be PNGs, I'll just use that.
we don't use svgs anywhere where they are the only view
